info.name: Ponyville Square Night Theme (Red)
info.description: A night theme for Ponyville Square forums
info.additionalInfo:
WARNING : Because text colors can be set in comment posts, some texts can be illegible ! I also set to transparent all highlighting in comment posts because text in comment posts has a white highlighting by default.

INFO : Some menus in the BBCode interface are still unmodified. Those menus are loaded after the user click on a button to display them and because Stylish can't inject CSS code in something loaded after the page, it's impossible to do it so.

----- Change log -----

Version 1.0.0 (released on 13/03/2017) :
 - First release.

Version 1.0.1 (released on 21/04/2017) :
 - Now covering the new main page
 - Some bugs fixed
